      • getBaseInfo

        android.os.Bundle getBaseInfo(android.os.Bundle bundle)
                       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        bundle - extend for the future
        Returns:
        bundle
          null or no key, value set means base is not connected, or cannot get the details
        • keys are defined from ConstWirelessBase
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • bindBase

        void bindBase(android.os.Bundle bundle)
       throws android.os.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        bundle - - if null or doesn't contain a key/value, then try to connect the last connected deviceInfo
          key - value. Keys defined from ConstWirelessBase.
        • BaseSN is requested, others are not
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • unbindBase

        int unbindBase()
        throws android.os.RemoteException
        This API is for unbind with a base, and need set new BaseSN to bindBase with another one
        Returns:
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • connectStatus

        int connectStatus(int timeout,
                  WirelessConnectListener wirelessConnectListener)
           throws android.os.RemoteException
        Parameters:
        timeout - 0~255, timeout >= 20, than it will try to connect / bind the base if no connected. otherwise, only get the connect status.
        wirelessConnectListener - , null for blocking the API till connected or timeout; otherwise, it's none-blocking, and wirelessConnectListener tells the result
        Returns:
        while none-blocking, 0 means processing; while blocking, 0 means connected, -1 for timeout, others for errors
        Throws:
        RemoteException
